title: What Would I Do
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Don't deceive me
Please don't leave me
What would I do without you to see me through?
If you leave me, oh baby, you'll grieve me
What would I do without you to see me through?
[Bridge]
What would I do?
I wanna know
What would I do?
Where would I go?
[Verse 2]
How you please me
When you squeeze me
What would I do without you to see me through?
[Instrumental Break]
[Bridge]
What would I do?
I wanna know
What would I do?
Where would I go?

[Verse 3]
Yes, I'm crazy
About my baby, oh, yes, I am
What would I do to see me through?
[Outro]
What would I do to see me through?
What would I do to see me through?
Oh-oh-oh-oh
